oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William A. Geiger
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William A. Geiger in color, standing with one hand on a chair at the estate of Dixon Place Downey in Vero Beach, Florida. Geiger was a member of the 149th Indiana Volunteer Infantry and was shot in the leg during the Civil War. He was originally from South Bend, Indiana. The image is hand-colored.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
